metadata.title: Orthofeet Proven Plantar Fasciitis & Foot Pain Relief. Extended Widths. Arch Support Women's Leather Moccasins Slippers Capri
description: Orthofeet Capri doctor recommended women's slippers feature comfortable arch support and non-binding upper that offer a relaxed fit and maximum protection against pressure points. The premium orthotic insoles along with the cushioning soles soften step, enhance stability, and improve mobility. Using its bio-mechanical expertise Orthofeet has been dedicated to designing the world’s most comfortable women’s slippers, best women’s plantar fasciitis slippers, best women’s diabetic slippers, best women’s orthopedic slippers, best women’s flat feet slippers, best women’s wide slippers and best women’s extra wide slippers. The soft upper, extra depth design and deep, wide toe box ease pressure on bunions and hammer toes, making these orthotic women’s slippers the best footwear solution for women’s bunion slippers and women’s slippers for hammertoes, women’s slippers for Morton’s Neuroma, women’s slippers for swollen feet, women’s slippers for heel spurs, women’s slippers for metatarsalgia, women’s slippers for ball of foot pain, women’s slippers for hip pain, women’s slippers for back pain, women’s slippers for Achilles tendonitis, and women’s slippers for overpronation.

title: Orthofeet Women's Leather Moccasins Slippers Capri
